;+
;> TEMPLATE31 = '00188-0856'
;> TEMPLATE61 = '00183-7111'
;
;  The 3.1 um H20 ice feature of 00188-0856 has tau=1.8
;  from Imanishi et al. (2006), and the 6.1 um H20 ice 
;  feature from the GTO Spitzer/IRS spectrum has tau=0.46,
;  giving tau(3.1)/tau(6.1)~4 for water ice.
;
;  The 00183-7111 GTO Spitzer/IRS spectrum was used as the
;  6.1 um template since it contains *no* detectable 6.2 um
;  PAH emission.
;-

;~            WAVE          OPACITY
